Articles.Content:
She alway watches you!

She knows your name.

She knows your parents.

She knows your friends.

She knows your daily routines.

You are in peace, one with Valentina, Valentina is love, Valentina is life

Click here to get to her space dungeon.

Her head is also fake! It wraps around and you can see where it overlaps on the back. Moreover her teeth arnt properly attached and (as with make Kerbals alike) her eyes partially hover just over her face!
That warp field is kinda cool and fun to play with. So much weird about this thread. I like it.
